text: The World Cup of Hockey is an international ice hockey tournament, and is the successor to the Canada Cup, which was held from 1976 to 1991. The World Cup of Hockey has been held twice, in 1996 and 2004. ==Results== Year Champion Runner-up Semi-finalists 1996 and 2004 and ==References== * MÃ¼ller, Stephan : International Ice Hockey Encyclopedia 1904-2005 / BoD GmbH Norderstedt, 2005 Category:Ice hockey competitions
title: World Cup of Hockey
